Item.aliases: railgun sonar shell, railgun decoy shell, railgun decoy
nuclear sonar shell,nuclear decoy shell,nuclear railgun decoy

Item.name: Halfshell Carrying Case
Item.description: A large container that makes it possible to lug around four halfshells in approximately the same profile as two regular sized shells. Allows the holder to transport up to 4 halfshells at a time.

Item.aliases: railgun homing shell,homing railgun shell,railgun torpedo
nuclear homing shell,homing nuclear shell,nuclear torpedo
railgun armor piercing shell, armor piercing railgun shell

Item.name: Hyper-Velocity Railgun Shell
Item.description: An exotic railgun shell which makes use of physicorium's lightness and fulgurium's charge storage to launch a shell at unthinkable velocities. It's expensive but it can punch through most submarines and monsters. (Max targets: 10)

Item.name: Ultra-Velocity Railgun Shell
Item.description: An improvement on the hypervelocity shell. It's prohibitively expensive but it can punch through entire stations. (Max targets: 20)

Item.name: Heavy Railgun Boarding Shell
Item.description: A hollowed out railgun shell that should be able to fit a person. Somewhat more comfortable than a regular boarding pod due to its size.

Item.aliases: Light Chaingun Piercing Ammunition Box,Piercing Light Chaingun Ammo Box
Light Chaingun Physicorium Ammunition Box,Physicorium Light Chaingun Ammo Box
Light Chaingun Armor-Piercing Explosive Ammunition Box,Armor-Piercing Explosive Light Chaingun Ammo Box

Item.description: An extremely large box of chaingun ammo, holds 1,000 rounds.
An extremely large box of chaingun ammo, holds 800 rounds.
A heavy box of 400 explosive Chaingun rounds.
An extremely heavy box containing 800 explosive Chaingun rounds.

Item.aliases: Autocannon Explosive Ammo Box,Explosive Autocannon Ammunition Box
Autocannon Armor Piercing Explosive Ammo Box
Micro SSL Armor-Piercing Explosive Ammo Box
Small SSL Armor Piercing Explosive Ammo Box

Item.name: Mining Laser Cell
Item.description: Heavy non-rechargable capacitor which supplies the isolated power modulation needed to drive an acoustic laser system. The casing includes large heatsinks to accommodate the unit's tendancy to heat up during extended use.

Item.aliases: Extended Exploding Ammunition,Extended Explosive Ammunition Box,Extended Explosive Ammunition
